abstract: The strike, set to begin early Saturday, could potentially delay an important new aircraft, the Dreamliner.
snippet: The strike, set to begin early Saturday, could potentially delay an important new aircraft, the Dreamliner.
lead_paragraph: The union that represents machinists at the Boeing Company said on Friday that it would go on strike early Saturday, potentially delaying the production of an important new aircraft, the Dreamliner.

headline.main: Machinists Union at Boeing Says It Will Strike

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: International Assn of Machinists and Aerospace Workers
